website_summaries.verdict: Although the Lumia 735 doesn't have the best camera, it's colourful, curvy and comfortable, has a good display and an affordable price -- all of which go a long way to making up for it.
pros: The Nokia Lumia 735 is comfy to hold, with colourful, interchangeable cases and a good screen
cons: Its camera doesn't impress, its processor doesn't provide enough power for demanding tasks, and its Windows Phone app store still receives little attention from developers

customer_reviews.title: Exceedingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, I had an old Nokia N8 and it had incompatible operating system for videos but not the new windows 8.1 Nokia. The apps have improved immensely the FLV app (free) plays MKV, avi, even Ts, files (for Hauppage users) without the need for conversion. The ,Here, map app is also good for navigation. Itunes compatible apps, help sync Itunes music with the Nokia Phone. It uses a nano sim card slot but it also has a slot for a micro SD card, which is nice for me because I had alot of files on my 16Gb SD card. If your looking for a smartphone that is good value for money then this phone is it.
customer_reviews.author: Risky

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone, bright screen and very responsive. Lots of apps and great for the price. Not a big phone compared to some of those around these days but it's much better for fitting into my pocket. Dark grey turned out to be black from what I can tell and it is definitely a quality phone.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Great quality phone. I don't have a good history with smartphones, budget phones aren't great. From what I hear the cheaper Lumia is great as well but I splashed out on this and don't regret. Good screen, better touch than iPad air and fully customizable. Only downside is windows store doesn't have everything that apple and android have, so expect limited choice on apps, but that is a downside with the windows store not this phone. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Darkness073

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and it is a great phone, having come from an Apple iPhone which is slow and full of lagging delays, it is great to have a phone that responds as soon as I press the screen. I only hope Amazon will do an app for it so I can watch my Instant videos on it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Horton

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Being so used to my android I thought this phone would be complicated, it is anything but, its fast, so easy to find all my apps, I love it. Probably the best phone I've ever had. A great phone at a great price 📱
customer_reviews.author: lainey bowman

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T CHARGE. I WANT A REFUND.
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone yesterday and it was fine until I tried to charge it. It won't charge, it keeps turning off and back on again up to 4 times in a row. This is ridiculous. The phone was meant to be brand new. It says it's charging but the percentage doesn't go up. It's stuck on 3%! Also, the box was already open (the seal was broken) and the charger is second hand! I would like a full refund please.
customer_reviews.author: ClintPople

customer_reviews.title: It's in German!
customer_reviews.text: I want to warn potential buyers that you switch the phone on everything in German. It's very tricky and time consuming working out how to go to settings and change it English - believe me, it took a while and if this phone is completely new to you good luck. My advice: look it up on google and even then it takes a while! It comes with 2 chargers: 1 is a Usb cable the other is a one you plug into a European socket!
customer_reviews.author: catherine salandre

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking phone, crystal clear face & nice to hold. This phone is also well priced and the home screen tiles are a brilliant feature. Very user friendly and nothing fiddly about it. Loses a star for not having near as many apps as android & apple phones and a major fault with the lumia phones is the fact they often freeze and also turn themselves off in mid conversation! I've had three lumia phones and they have all done this!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jason Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: really nice phone even better than my i phone 5 which ...
customer_reviews.text: really nice phone even better than my i phone 5 which had a very bad battery life . the reason I needed a replacement and bought this. happy days i now get up to 2 days on standby as i am low user for calls and text ,
customer_reviews.author: Dennis I.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little phone. Fantastic screen, great camera both front and back. Just received update to Windows 10 mobile which has improved an already excellent phone. Buy while you can. For what I require for a business day to day phone this does it all.
customer_reviews.author: stephen reid

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever done
customer_reviews.text: Why do people say "you don't want a windows phone? There's nothing wrong with them. Best thing I ever done.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to replace one had already as screen was cracked good price and quick delivery and great price too recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: jelena

customer_reviews.title: nokia upgrade
customer_reviews.text: An update from Nokia 635. Good battery life. Similar layout so I know where i am. Slightly larger but thats good in terms of screen size.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the phone itself was fine, up and running in no time. there is an issue with the charger however. the connection required a disconcerting amount of force to plug into the phone, and the plug is moulded, which means you can't use it to hook up to a laptop or computer, or indeed a USB power source
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nokia 735 Lumia
customer_reviews.text: All appears as should be although this has been bought as a spare phone in case my current 735 goes faulty. The product arrived in a timely manner. No concerns.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Good simple smart phone
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this phone. It replaced an older Nokia of the same colour which dies when we tried to replace the sim card.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul E Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit....
customer_reviews.text: My first Smartphone, but to date impressed with the size, quality and ease in setting up. Import of my contacts from old Nokia was really easy with app. Already loaded on phone. Very pleased! Supplier good, phone arrived when expected, well packaged etc.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Anne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic phone!!! A+
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic phone. Its slimlined, quick responce screen, amazing apps and is the best upgrade of a windows phone they have done since the launch!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift for a 12yrs old last ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a 12yrs old last year. He still loves it, and was on sale so not too expensive for a new high school pupil.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Ibe

customer_reviews.title: Thief proof
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a basic phone having dropped and smashed the screen of my previous phone. No-one covets a Nokia so no-one's going to nick it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th lumia I like them they are easy to use take good photos and no annoying ads
customer_reviews.author: Lesley V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it to bits ! Slight problem with battery, being attended to by Supplier !

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PHONE VERY EASY TO SET UP AND CORTANA IS VERY GOOD HELPS TO KEEP MY APPOINTMENTS TO HAND
customer_reviews.author: clanline

customer_reviews.title: fantastic value for money and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: It came earlier than expected which was great as was desperate for a new phone! It's amazing. I love it! Would definitely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ani ❤️

customer_reviews.title: good size and easy to
customer_reviews.text: arrived before estimated date,gradually adding apps, good size and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: I am still finding my way around the phone.
customer_reviews.text: I am still finding my way around the phone .but enjoying it si far

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Has all the functions I need. No cons, just all pros.

customer_reviews.title: Fab phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant phone. It works great and looks more expensive then it actually is. The camera is great, the selfie camera is better than I expected also.

customer_reviews.title: Promising start from an excellent device
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived today and have been busy setting it up this evening! Really pleased with the device itself and it's many features - the cameras are excellent. Will see how I get on over the next few days but definitely far better than an Android phone :)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Such a great phone. Had a problem with the handset after a couple of months but contacted amazon and they replaced the whole handset with no cost to me. Definitely recommend this phone to everyone. Never liked a phone as much as this one
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone, easy to use. Brilliant features and good apps pre loaded onto the phone and many more to download. Would highly recommend this phone.

customer_reviews.title: good make quality and os is nicely laid out
customer_reviews.text: absolutely worth the money. good make quality and os is nicely laid out. better than android in my experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. The screen is a good size
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. The screen is a good size. I was worried about Windows 8 on it but having used Android before I think Windows is a lot better and easier to use
customer_reviews.author: MR W.

customer_reviews.title: this phone is amazing, I used to have an iphone 5s this ...
customer_reviews.text: this phone is amazing , I used to have an iphone 5s this is much better easy to use and looks very expensive and sleek
customer_reviews.author: georgina beresford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Would be nice to have a dual SIM version
customer_reviews.author: John OGAZUMA

customer_reviews.title: competent mid level mobile
customer_reviews.text: Having used a Lumia 820 for 2 years I was eager to stay with windows phone for replacement felt the 830 didn't offer more than the 735 to justify the extra cost so plumped for this. Screen is slightly smaller than used to but the perfect black and bright vivid colours in HD are perfect speed and touch response are good. This has been a good replacement and hasn't put me off windows phone with the add bonus of Cortana before old phone would have got update easy phone for novices or more experienced the shinny removable back cover is easy to remove and feels good to handle
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D. Wotherspoon

customer_reviews.title: An excellent phone and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: An excellent phone and so easy to use. The speaker for music is surprisingly good and I particularly like the very easy to use diary. A pity that there is not an external button for the camera otherwise I would have given the whole instrument five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tp Macdonald-pearce

customer_reviews.title: good for selfies and video calls on skype
customer_reviews.text: Lumia 735 is a pocket friendly phone with a powerful front camera, good for selfies and video calls on skype, however for videos or to surf the net, I was highly disappointed as my older HTC desire ( android) performs better then the Lumia 735. Cortana is not so so helpful compared to the voice assistant in androids latest phones and this is down to Windows phones limited integration with Google products. Windows Market Applications are few and looks kindergarten. You tube app by default does not have voice control while a downloadable version with voice control and HD video does not work so efficiently, it includes advs and the video quality remain poor.
customer_reviews.author: Admin

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone has not skipped a beat, it just works its so dependable and reliable coming from a previous android user my last 5 phones have been top of the range androids. They are overpriced and the software just is not as functional !
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, really pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, really pleased with it. Only real shortcoming is the shortage of some apps in the store which are available from apple and other mobile phone stores
customer_reviews.author: Simon Gotelee

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't need gimmicks or complexity
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace one I dropped; I still find it perfectly suited to my needs
customer_reviews.author: C. Potter

customer_reviews.title: recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone it's simple to use, and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig.S

customer_reviews.title: I think the Windows os is great, but the style and quality of the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 14 year old boy by request. absolutely loves it and is finding all the similar apps to what he had before on the BlackBerry. I think the Windows os is great, but the style and quality of the phone could be better, but very reasonably priced, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Charles Blay

customer_reviews.title: apart from that one big problem i loved it until i could use it
customer_reviews.text: i have had it for 2 weeks and now it wont even turn on or charge no matter what i do. apart from that one big problem i loved it until i could use it. the volume it big the pictures are great and overall i just loved for the two weeks i had it. i will never buy a phone from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: one off or faulty product?
customer_reviews.text: had this phone for 2 months now and the rear camera has stopped working and the phone turns itself off randomly and back on again a few hours later. Apart from that its fine...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, easy to use and haven't had any problems... Cortana is a little disappointing though
customer_reviews.author: MaxJax95

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came with damaged display and was not working. When phone was turn on display was showing just green stripes cross whole screen. After short period display was turning black but I have been still able to press buttons etc. (phone was vibrating and making sounds). I think somebody was playing with the phone and drop it or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Cannot comment yet as I have only just set it ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot comment yet as I have only just set it up and entered £10. Not yet had time to go any further.
customer_reviews.author: colin wharin

customer_reviews.title: No regrets and totally happy
customer_reviews.text: I recently migrated from Android to Windows and got this as I was unsure if I would like it. I love it and am totally happy with the layout, speed and apps. A number of Apps that I would have searched for on Android are pre-installed on Lumia including maps software, compass, photo manipulation and a whole bunch of other stuff. Finding the few apps not pre-installed was easy too. The design is brilliant as well as the clarity of the images. Certainly a great buy and not pricey at all as am on contract through Amazon with O2.
customer_reviews.author: BRT

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone. I originally bought on in November ast year and absolutely loved it. However, I got sucked in by the Samsung advertising machine and ended up buying a S6 Edge (hated it) then an S6. I enjoyed the S6 for its camera and nothing more. I longed for the cosy and utterly comfortable windows phone environment. Ergo I have returned to this phone again. My partner has my last one. This phone truly fits all my needs. The camera is perfectly adequate, call quality is excellent, apps are fine (I'm not a facebooker or instagramer). An absolutely solidly built phone with a superb OS. Easy to use and for me just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LGE

customer_reviews.title: Great device let down by a unsupported app store
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a non working charger. Device however was nice, navigation of the menus and features seemed simple. BUT it's biggest let down was the app store. Basic apps you'd expect to see(fb messenger, Snapchat and more) were unsupported or out of date. A real shame for a nice phone. I contacted seller and they arranged a return immediately and my refund was back in my bank two days after returning. The seller also replied almost immediately to any questions. 5 stars to them. 3 for the product. Avoid this phone
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Is anybody out there?
customer_reviews.text: Great modern phone, easy to set up and use. I purchased this for my son to replace his Lumia 635 and it was simple to get up and running and transferred all of his contacts effortlessly. I have no hesitation in recommending this seller and phone to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Grandad

customer_reviews.title: Nokia Lumia 735
customer_reviews.text: Was assured this was genuine,however sound quality was not up to Nokia standards,also a Microsoft branded battery was included instead of a proper Nokia branded battery which this phone came with in the original year of manufacture.Needless to say I returned this phone unused.
customer_reviews.author: stan the man

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever bought. I've tried 'em all. Android, iPhone and basic granny phones. They never really suited me but this one ticks all the boxes. It may be because I have always been a Windows user and I understand it. Being a bit hard of hearing I was worried it would not be loud enough. However, it is plenty loud enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Panny

customer_reviews.title: great value for a great phone
customer_reviews.text: if you have windows 10 this phone is great updates pairs up with pc wireless QI CHARGING could not ask for more like having your pc in your pocket!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Graham S.

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: phone came in great condition. love the screen, as it is relatively large and the resolution is high so it feels really comfortable to look at. i put the battery saving mode on and barely need to charge it for 3 days. neat! just keep in mind it uses nano card. I had to have my old micro-sim card cut to fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Li

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone ^_^
customer_reviews.text: I will never go back to iPhone or anything Android after switching to WinPhone and this one is a great value one. No more buggy OS's and vague crashing that I had to live with before the comfort and stability of Windows / Nokia combination. I will NEVER go back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sim card slot is tricky I had to visit a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sim card slot is tricky I had to visit a phone shop to get it fixed seems difficult to get the sim out once I put it in otherwise phone works well although I still prefer my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Chash

customer_reviews.title: Great Windows Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, got all the bells and whistles on it. Easy to use as its a windows phone and i like windows software. Only downsize is if you have big hands like me you will keep pressing the wrong key. I find this with every phone though. Bring back the Nokia 6310. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Gfeat phone
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone. Lovell the features. Fits well into hand. Possible the best phone I have had. Better than Lumia 800, 920 and 925. Also prefer over my iPhone 3 and 4s. love the option to miracast directly to my tv. it really is 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Nokia Lumia 735, it does everything I need. Could also upgrade to windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: john ashford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Much better than my lumia 630. Keep in mind it needs a nano sim.

customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, got it to replace a broken one, simple with brilliant apps!

customer_reviews.text: Amazingly cheap and affordable. Camera quality is amazing. Love the customization and features

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: great phone, had for just a few days and can't fault it.

customer_reviews.title: Now replaced by the excellent Samsung Galaxy Core which is like chalk and cheese
customer_reviews.text: awful phone -- it takes ages to get it to respond, the wireless charging never functioned and the screen is really difficult to use. Got one star because it links well with the hands free in the car and will send and receive text messages via voice-- even then not very well. Now replaced by the excellent Samsung Galaxy Core which is like chalk and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: STR

customer_reviews.title: A real green screen
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package, put the battery in, power on... black screen with green lines... nothing else. Seems from reviews here I'm not the only person with this problem. It's either a bad batch/how it's been transported or there's an underlying fault here. In any case it kind of puts me off ordering another...
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Long battery but...
customer_reviews.text: As a phone, it works very good, but having windows phone is just not enough 9 times out of 10. App are just too few, and there are so many others that have to be greatly improved... Everyday I think, it's the battery enough excuse to keep the phone?
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Phone came the next day phone is great early days yet but my wife has one and ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone came the next day phone is great early days yet but my wife has one and its been great for her
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, can' t see why anyone would pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, can' t see why anyone would pay so much for an Apple or equivalent. Responsive screen, quick and loads of apps...

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my new phone, was very easy to use as it is basically the same as my computer and compared with other overrated well known brand it is reasonably priced.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! easy to use and it looks great!

customer_reviews.title: My first smartphone and I love it. Bit daunting at first
customer_reviews.text: My first smartphone and I love it. Bit daunting at first, but after exploring the different apps and settings , I now find it so easy to use. I've used this phone for about a month and can't imagine life without it.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Came without any instructions, so I am still unsure of how to program or use it.

customer_reviews.text: As always Nokia are cool 😎, with windows it's the perfect partnership.

customer_reviews.text: Having some real issues with my phone simply turning itself off for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Slow, very very slow...
customer_reviews.text: Very slow, Cortana didn't work properly and the camera was definitely not as good as I expected from a 6mp camera.

product_meta.title: NOKIA Lumia 735 Orange 8GB RM-1038 4.7" INCHES Factory Unlocked LTE 4G 3G 2G GSM Cell Phone
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT : NOKIA LUMIA 735 ORANGE 8GB RM-1038 4.7" INCHES FACTORY UNLOCKED LTE 4G 3G 2G GSM CELL PHONE 

MODEL NO : LUMIA 735 

COMPATIBLE TO USE WITH NETWORK SIM CARDS THAT WORKS ON 
2G : GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 and/or 
3G : 850(B5) / 900(B8) / 2100(B1) and/or 
4G : LTE 800(B20) / 1800(B3) / 2600(B7) 
FREQUENCIES : IMPORTANT : PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR NETWORK PROVIDER THE COMPATIBILITY BEFORE YOU BUY. 

We do not ship to Cuba, Sudan, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Syria, Somalia, Ghana, Rwanda, Congo, Zimbabwe, Uzbekistan, Nigeria, Nicaragua & Vietnam.
